title: ( ARURF DATE AND TIME ) PLS RIOT , I cant wait
body:
I wonder when they will release ARURF cuz I have been  waiting it and staying in front of the computer for days , maaan!

some opinions on "When they will release it ?"

replies.body: ARURF is garbage. Why wait for a game mode they butchered because bad players cried? Oh, Jax, Sona... So, let us ruin everyone else and give them trash champions like Soraka. The whole game mode is pure RNG on who gets the most cancerous, broken, brainless champions possible.
